# init(serviceName:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCConnection] object to connect to an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCListener] object in an XPC service, identified by a service name.

## Declaration

```swift
init(serviceName: String)
```

## Discussion

XPC services are helper processes that are usually part of your application bundle. The service should use [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCListener] to wait for new connections.

## Creating a connection

- **init(listenerEndpoint:)**: Initializes an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCConnection] object to connect to an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCListener] object in another process, identified by an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCListenerEndpoint] object.
- **init(machServiceName:options:)**: Initializes an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCConnection] object to connect to a LaunchAgent or LaunchDaemon with a name advertised in a `launchd.plist`.
- **NSXPCConnection.Options**: Options that you can pass to a connection.
